file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-10-07-04 - MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR OR ALL, EXCEPT A/C WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR, OR PRE-MOD SB 145-52-0005 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the springs of the first, second, and third steps of the main door. B. To remove the springs of the fourth step, refer to (AMM TASK 52-11-05-000-801-A/400). C. To install the springs of the fourth step, refer to (AMM TASK 52-11-05-400-801-A/400). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- STAIRS DOOR OR ALL, EXCEPT A/C WITH 52-10-07-000-801-A MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - REMOVAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR, OR PRE-MOD SB 145-52-0005 AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- STAIRS DOOR OR ALL, EXCEPT A/C WITH MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - INSTALLA- 52-10-07-400-801-A SIDE-HINGED MAIN TION DOOR, OR PRE-MOD SB 145-52-0005 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-10-07 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-10-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR OR ALL, EXCEPT A/C WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR, OR PRE-MOD SB 145-52-0005 2. MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the springs of the first, second, and third steps of the main door. (2) The procedure to remove the springs of the fourth step of the main door is given in (AMM TASK 52-11-05-000-801-A/400). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - REMOV- AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/400 AL MAIN DOOR FIRST SECOND AND THIRD STEPS - AMM TASK 52-10-03-000-801-A/400 REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING-HANDLE TOR- AMM TASK 52-11-05-000-801-A/400 QUE TUBE - REMOVAL S.B.145-52-0023 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (2) Remove the step-tread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-10-07 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal of the Step Springs (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-52-0023, remove the step springs as given in ( AMM TASK 52-10-03-000-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0023, refer to (Figure 401) and remove the step springs as follows: (a) Remove the nuts (1) and (9), washers (2) and (8), spring guide (3), bolt (5), and roller (7). (b) Remove the springs (4) and (10) from the bolt (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-10-07 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. 145-52-0023 Main-Door Step Springs - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 811 B DET. A 1. NUT 2. WASHER 3. SPRING GUIDE 10. SPRING 4. SPRING (2) 9. NUT 8. WASHER 7. ROLLER 5. BOLT DET. B 6. BOLT 145AMM520352.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-10-07 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-10-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR OR ALL, EXCEPT A/C WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR, OR PRE-MOD SB 145-52-0005 3. MAIN-DOOR STEP SPRINGS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the springs of the first, second, and third steps of the main door. (2) The procedure to install the springs of the fourth step of the main door is given in (AMM TASK 52-11-05-400-801-A/400). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A/400 LATION MAIN DOOR FIRST SECOND AND THIRD STEPS - AMM TASK 52-10-03-400-801-A/400 INSTALLATION MAIN DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE TOR- AMM TASK 52-11-05-400-801-A/400 QUE TUBE - INSTALLATION S.B.145-52-0023 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Installation of the Step Springs (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-52-0023, install the step springs as given in ( AMM TASK 52-10-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-10-07 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) NOTE: Obey the installation order and position of the components as shown in (Figure 401). For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0023, refer to figure 401 and install the step springs as follows: (a) Put the bolt (5) and roller (7) in their installation positions. (b) Put the springs (4) and (10) in their installation positions in the bolt (6) and in the roller (7). (c) Install the spring guide (3), washers (2) and (8), and nuts (1) and (9). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) With the steps fully deployed, check the spring of each step. They must not be tensioned or twisted. (a) A tensioned spring indicates that the shaft of the step or the spring support, is wrongly installed. Remove the shaft of the step and install it back correctly ( AMM TASK 52-10-03-400-801-A/400) and/or (AMM TASK 52-11-05-400-801-A/400). (2) Install the step-tread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A/400). (3) Close the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-10-07 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
